flavor_text: When it is angered the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.
This Pokemon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600F.
Very intelligent it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
